name: Chroma Rush (itch)
description:
Sphere's everyone hates sphere's.  Can you kill this one before it kills you?

Controls : ------------

Move ____WASD

Aim______Mouse

Shoot____Left Click

Credits: ------------

Scripts___Past Projects

Repo_____GitHub

This game was made for the Mini Jam 73 : Power game jam.  The theme was Power and the limitation was only 5 colors displayed at once.
